eqnarray:
\begin{eqnarray}\label{so_basis}
&{\cal L}_{nm}=-\frac{1}{4}\epsilon_{nmk}\sigma^{k\alpha\beta}(a_\alpha a^+_\beta+
a^+_\beta a_\alpha)\,,\nonumber\\
&{\cal P}_n=\frac{1}{2}\sigma_n{}^{\alpha\beta}a_\alpha a_\beta\,,
\qquad {\cal K}_n=\frac{1}{2}\sigma_n{}^{\alpha\beta}a^+_\alpha a^+_\beta\,,\\
&{\cal D}=\frac{1}{4}(a_\alpha a^{+\alpha}+a^{+\alpha}a_\alpha)\nonumber\,,
\

\begin{eqnarray}
&&\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!{\cal L}_{nm}c(x)=(x_m\partial_n-x_n\partial_m)c(x)\,,\nonumber\\
&&\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!
{\cal L}_{nm}c_\alpha(x)=\Big((x_m\partial_n-x_n\partial_m)\delta_\alpha^\beta+
\frac{1}{2}\epsilon_{nmk}\sigma^{k\beta}{}_\alpha\Big) c_\beta(x)\,,\nonumber\\
&&\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!{\cal P}_n c(x)=\partial_n
c(x)\,,\qquad\qquad\qquad\qquad\;
{\cal P}_n c_\alpha(x)=\partial_n c_\alpha(x)\,,\nonumber\\
&&\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!{\cal K}_n c(x)=(x_n+2x_n x^k\partial_k-x^2\partial_n )c(x)\,,\\
&&\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!{\cal K}_n c_\alpha(x)= \Big((2x_n+2x_n x^k
\partial_k-x^2\partial_n)\delta_\alpha^\beta-
\epsilon_{nmk}x^m\sigma^{k\beta}{}_\alpha\Big) c_\beta(x)\,,\nonumber\\
&&\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!\!{\cal D} c(x)=(\frac{1}{2}+x^k \partial_k) c(x)\,,\qquad
\qquad\;\;\;{\cal D} c_\alpha(x)=(1+x^k\partial_k) c_\alpha(x)\nonumber\,.
\
